name: Generative AI Models: Everything You Need to Know - Velvetech
snippet: A generative AI model is trained when collected data is fed into it. Based on how well it handles the data and formulates predictions, a model’s hyperparameters are tuned again and again for optimal performance. Next, it is put through validation and evaluated on a number of highly specific metrics.
